data.title: Storage 3.0: Storage Innovation Enters An Exciting New Phase
data.meta_description: Storage 3.0: Storage Innovation Enters An Exciting New Phase - Free ebook download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read book online for free. A new wave of enterprise storage innovation is upon us driven by interesting startups. Concepts being spawned or making a comeback include converged infrastructure, converged primary and backup storage. The real relative winners in this exciting dynamic are likely to be players that execute relentlessly and effectively.
data.text: Storage 3.0: Storage Innovation Enters An Exciting New Phase
